name: INTERDISCIPLINARY_GROUP
description: This table contains a list of the interdisciplinary group members who reviewed a patient's plan of care as documented in a Plan of Care (POC) or POC update.

columns.name: POC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IDG_MEM_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the provider record of the interdisciplinary group member.

columns.name: IDG_MEM_DISCPLN_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the discipline of the interdisciplinary group member.

columns.name: IDG_INST_ADDED_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant when an interdisciplinary group member was added.

columns.name: IDG_USER_ADDED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user who added the interdisciplinary group member.

columns.name: IDG_USER_ADDED_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
